title: Litro wants to increase gas prices
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro Chairman says that a request was made from the Cabinet of Ministers to increase gas prices.
The request comes at a time when many Sri Lankans have been forced to stay in line from dawn to dusk to purchase domestic gas cylinders, due to a shortage of supply in the local market.
Sri Lanka will prevail & engineer rapid economic recovery; President tells BIMSTEC
